~Band Information~
No Spiritual Surrender is an EP (later released on CD) by the band Inside Out. It was their first and last release before their breakup in 1991.

The album features Zack de la Rocha, who later went on to front Rage Against the Machine. His vocals on No Spiritual Surrender are vastly different than his rapped vocals on the Rage Against the Machine records, but you can begin to hear the forming of his style.
